data.title: Great Tasting Chinese Food
data.text: We have family that works at the Pinch-A-Penny store in the same shopping center and they order from here all the time. It's great Chinese food. Once the "Kimchi Mart" opens in the same shopping center this will be a great one-stop shop for all things Chinese.

data.title: Tasty Chinese Treat Nearby
data.text: Good food. Great selection. Reasonable price. Fast service.  We bought to go because they are close but they do deliver. Friendly staff.  What more can you ask for?

data.title: Favorite Chinese Restaurant
data.text: My family, friends, and I have been eating at Dragon Gate for over 20 years when we all first moved to Pembroke Pines. Back then, there weren't many restaurant choices. Through the years and all new restaurants which have come and gone DRAGON GATE continues to serve delicious food. The owner is very friendly to his customers. Take out/to go food is delicious too. We have catered for parties from them and even attended the Chinese New Year celebration which was amazing!

data.title: Take out for years
data.text: I have been ordering take out for my family at least once a month of the past 9 years. It so fresh, hot and kind people. We live 13 miles away and I pass 5 other places like this on my way. We have gone and eaten their, same results.  Best in the Pines and I am sure all around by miles.    If you lucky you will see the Mayor eating with his wife.

data.title: WOW....excellent!!!!
data.text: Awesome egg drop soup, cashew chicken yummy!!!! Special fried rice....the best. Nice service in a family atmosphere. Highly recommended

data.title: Saturday night dinner
data.text: By far and away the best Chinese food in South Florida . Richard has a great staff with a can do attitude. Being a NYoridian who ate in China town i know good Chinese food. Thanks Richard for another excellent meal

data.title: Awful
data.text: Used to go there years ago and food was great. Came today had mixed soup egg drop/wonton, no taste. Egg roll same, honey garlic chicken (which I used to love) had  a strange sweet taste, not honey and did not taste like garlic at all. Very disappointed. Will not come back.

data.title: Consistently Good Food/Service
data.text:
My wife and I came in for dinner. Dragon Gate is our favorite local Chinese dining choice.
We generally order one of the combo meals. The prices are good and the meal includes soup, an egg roll, and dessert, along with the entree which includes white or fried rice.
We also have the hot tea with our meal. Service is very good and attentive.
If we ever have a wait we always see lots of customers coming in for take-out.
The atmosphere is nothing special, but we always have another meal or two to take home as they give you a lot of food.
We've always been happy with the food as it is usually very good.

data.title: Great Chinese Food
data.text: The fried rice is amazing. All of the dished are good. The food has an authentic Chinese food taste. The restaurant is always packed on a Friday/Saturday evening.

data.title: Very good food
data.text: This was my Mom & Dad's go to Chinese restaurant for many, many years. Joined my Mom for a dinner celebrating my Dad's life. The hot & sour soup is SUPERB, as well is the sliced roast pork!  Scallops in garlic sauce, sautéed eggplant and the shrimp delight (shrimp with freshly sautéed vegetables) were all tasty, fresh and nicely portioned. All the staff were attentive & gracious.  This continues to be a favorite restaurant for our family.

data.title: Dragon Gate Restaurant
data.text: I recently revisited this restaurant and my family and I enjoyed the food and the quiet and relaxed atmosphere of this establishment. I recommend it to anyone who enjoys good Chinese food at afeasonable price.

data.title: Very decent food, good portions
data.text: I'm kind of picky about my food and this is the only place where a eat Chinese food. Really nice food, delivery is fast, I usually order to take out.

data.title: Our favorite Chinese restaurant
data.text: This is the only restaurant we will order Chinese food from, or go to eat. Consistently good food, friendly service, and fair prices. We absolutely love the fillet fish as an appetizer, with delicious chunks of fried fish that we like to dip in the ginger sauce that we order to come on the side. We bring all our visiting friends and family whenever we are feeling for some Chinese food. The hot sake is great, and we always order some nice cold Asian beers to go along with it. A must-try!

data.title: Dragon gate Chinese, Pembroke Pines,Fl. Delicious
data.text:
Our usual go to Chinese restaurant for a very good meal

BBQ ribs  large ribs
Hot and sour soup medium spice requested seafood instead of Pork
sweet and sour Shrimp
Egg foo young with shrimp, better quality shrimp should be used in this dish

Scallops in black bean sauce with vegetables medium spice

White Steamed rice.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: This restaurant is clean and decorated with chinese objects. Staff is very friendly and helpful.. The food is very well prepared and portions are ample.

data.title: Delish
data.text: Dragon gate has been at this location for many many years. Their vegetable fried rice, back bean tofu and lo mein are very good. Very friendly to their customers. Food is always ready when called in.

data.title: Ok
data.text:
If you are looking for a good Chinese place that has plenty of options in this strange little area, here it is for you.

The staff is very nice, particularly the service staff.  We had a server named Juan. I don't believe he was Chinese but nevertheless he really knew how to deliver good customer service and make good for someone like me who is working out like a madman and being rather health conscious!  

The decor, very odd.  Cheap furniture and office-like ceilings but we came for the food.  

Prices are decent and service is good if you find yourself in this neck-of-the-woods!

data.title: Best Chinese and family friendly restaurant
data.text: I live not too far from this restaurant and the food never disappoints and also the people are very friendly.  They know you by name and remember what I usually order.  This restaurant is family owned and has been there for many many years.

data.title: good taste
data.text: we ordered in. they were pretty fast. we all enjoyed our food. they also gave enough noodles and soy and hot mustard. you do receive fortune cookies.

data.title: Fortune Cookie said "Excellent idea."
data.text: They say if the rest room is clean so is the kitchen.  The rest room was cleaner than I expected.  I would recommend the tile walls to be wiped down.  It appears some customers are not respectful and put nasty things on the tiles.  I would also increase the lighting in the restroom with LED lights.  The ceiling was very water stained.  The overall rating of the restroom was a "B" report card.  We ordered and split Moo Shu Pork.  Our meal was very good and the wait staff was attentive and friendly.  This was our lunch and we arrived late around 2 PM.  Our table did not have a table cloth but the staff was putting table cloths on for the evening meals.  I have this fear of bare tables not being cleaned properly.  We did have paper place mats.  I find it interesting that we ordered from the same menu as the evening meal, paid the same price, but did not have a table cloth.   I am sure it is less expensive for them to leave the table cloths off for the lunch bunch.  My companion commented that the meal cooled off very quickly once it was delivered.  We don't really have any suggestions on how to keep it heated.  We have been wanting to visit this restaurant for some time and we will be returning again.
